content: easy dog hoodie crochet pattern cozy comfy and perfect for every pup keep your four-legged best friend warm and stylish with this easy dog hoodie crochet pattern whether you ve got a tiny sidekick a chunky cuddlebug or a long-legged gentle giant this pattern is designed to fit dogs of all shapes and sizes if you can single_crochet and double_crochet you can make this adorable hoodie materials worsted weight yarn crochet hook in size 4 5mm - or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker
